ee:variables.ee:set-variable: #[ %dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- " SELECT top " ++ vars.maxRecords as String ++ " RTRIM(CustomerAccountNumber) as CustomerAccountNumber, " ++ " RTRIM(Managed_Agency_Code) as Managed_Agency_Code, " ++ " RTRIM(BirthCert_OnFile) as BirthCert_OnFile, " ++ " RTRIM(Long_Name_Line_5) as Long_Name_Line_5, " ++ " RTRIM(Pending_SocialServices_Assessment) as Pending_SocialServices_Assessment, " ++ " RTRIM(Non_Responsive_Guardian) as Non_Responsive_Guardian, " ++ " FORMAT(Age_Of_Majority, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS Age_Of_Majority, " ++ " FORMAT(DistPlan_ExpireDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS DistPlan_ExpireDate, " ++ " FORMAT(Temporary_CourtOrder_ExpireDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS Temporary_CourtOrder_ExpireDate, " ++ " FORMAT(StartTime, 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ') AS StartTime " ++ " FROM VCrm_AccountMaster_UDF " ++ " WHERE StartTime > :validFrom " ]

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- payload map (item, value) ->{ account: item.CustomerAccountNumber as String, distributionExpiration: item.DistPlan_ExpireDate, temporaryCourtOrderExp: item.Temporary_CourtOrder_ExpireDate, birthCertificate: item.BirthCert_OnFile, ageMajority: item.Age_Of_Majority, line5: item.Long_Name_Line_5,
pendingSocServ: if (!isEmpty(item.tierLevelCode)) item.tierLevelCode else "#N/A",
pendingSocServ: if (item.Pending_SocialServices_Assessment != 0) true else false,
pendingSocServ: item.Pending_SocialServices_Assessment, managedAgencyCode: item.Managed_Agency_Code, managedAgencyName: item.Managed_Agency_Name, nonResponsiveGuardian: item.Non_Responsive_Guardian, date: item.StartTime }
